name: part_010
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】hololive 3rd Generation Live#きゅるるん大作戦〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜【DAY2】 [XJJXk28ivwY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: The hololive 3rd generation members (Usada Pekora, Houshou Marine, Shirogane Noel, and Shiranui Flare) talk to the audience and stream viewers after the opening medley, announcing the end of the free sneak peek section.
End card with information stating that the free sneak peek portion of the stream has ended.

subtitles.original: かっこいいですね、これねー
subtitles.english: This looks so cool, doesn't it?

subtitles.original: 可愛いー！
subtitles.english: So cute!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: 嬉しいですよ
subtitles.english: I'm so happy.

subtitles.original: そして配信のコメントももちろん見てるぺこー！
subtitles.english: And of course I'm watching the stream comments too, peko!

subtitles.original: コメントのみんなー！
subtitles.english: To everyone in the comments!

subtitles.original: もうもちろん会場のみんなももちろんあたりまえー！
subtitles.english: And of course, everyone here in the venue too!

subtitles.original: みんな素敵な気合の入った推し活ファッションしてきてくれてありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone for coming in such great fandom outfits with so much spirit!

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 可愛いー！
subtitles.english: So cute!

subtitles.original: 最高、最高ですよ
subtitles.english: It's the best, really the best.

subtitles.original: いや、もう、ちょっぱな、シャッフルメドレーでしたけどー
subtitles.english: Man, we kicked things off with the shuffle medley...

subtitles.original: 凄かったよね！
subtitles.english: It was amazing, right?

subtitles.original: アゲアゲだったよね！
subtitles.english: It was so hype!

subtitles.original: でもですね、なんとですね、ここまでのー
subtitles.english: But, you know what? Up until now...

subtitles.original: 冒頭無料チラ見せが、終了となります！
subtitles.english: The free opening sneak peek is coming to an end!

subtitles.original: えー！？そんなー、嘘だー、嘘でしょー！
subtitles.english: What?! No way! You're kidding, right?!

subtitles.original: 嘘だぺこー！
subtitles.english: You're lying, peko!

subtitles.original: 嘘じゃないぺこですね
subtitles.english: It's not a lie-peko.

subtitles.original: でも、みんな見たいと思ってくれてると思うから、
subtitles.english: But since I'm sure everyone wants to keep watching,

subtitles.original: 概要欄に配信チケットリンクあるので、今、ポチポチっと買って見てみてください！
subtitles.english: there's a ticket link in the description, so please click and buy one now to keep watching!

subtitles.original: お願いします！
subtitles.english: Please!

subtitles.original: 今日は凄い、今日も、むしろ昨日よりブチ上がってるから！
subtitles.english: It's crazy today—even more hype than yesterday!

subtitles.original: もうブチ上げブチ上げで準備してますから！
subtitles.english: We're all set to keep the energy through the roof!

subtitles.original: Day 1とは違ったね、良さ、盛り上がり、そう、もう、君たちも今日超ブチ上がりなんで！
subtitles.english: The energy is different from Day 1, and you guys are absolutely fired up today!

subtitles.original: 頑張って最後まで息切れしないようにブチ上がってください！
subtitles.english: Keep that energy up and stay hype until the very end without burning out!

subtitles.original: しっかり声出してねー！
subtitles.english: Make some noise!

subtitles.original: そしてね、配信で楽しんでる人は、
subtitles.english: And for those enjoying the stream,

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグ『きゅるるん大作戦Day2』でいっぱい呟いてください！
subtitles.english: please tweet a lot using the hashtag #KyururunDaisakusenDay2!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ドキドキするね、そろそろいいですか？
subtitles.english: Alright, I'm getting nervous. Are you ready?

subtitles.original: 行きますか？次の曲に行ってみてもいいでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Shall we go? Can we move on to the next song?

subtitles.original: 行っちゃいましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's do it!

subtitles.original: ではですね、次の曲は、なんと私からスタートさせていただく...
subtitles.english: Well then, the next song actually starts with me...

subtitles.original: おおー、何が来るの？
subtitles.english: Oh! What's coming?

subtitles.original: じゃあ次の曲、行きましょう！フルアメドレー！
subtitles.english: Then let's go to the next song! Furua Medley!

subtitles.original: 無料パートは終了いたしました。ご視聴ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: The sneak peek part of the show has ended. Thank you for watching!
